channel.title: 3D Printing on Samuel Petrina
channel.description: Recent content in 3D Printing on Samuel Petrina

item.title: Wheelchair Cup Holder
item.description: This was a quick design and 3D printing project for my mother. She works as an OT and one of her patients needed a cup-holder attached to his wheel chair. She showed me a janky metal bracket that was previously being used and I thought I could do better. After a few minutes of design, we had this. 3D printed cup-holder mount
